installCommand: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Cleaning...' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json .npmrc && echo 'âš™ï¸ Creating .npmrc...' && echo 'engine-strict=true' > .npmrc && echo 'legacy-peer-deps=false' >> .npmrc && echo 'ğŸ“¦ Installing dependencies...' && npm install --force && echo 'âœ… Install complete!' && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ” VERIFICATION:' && echo '  Package.json name:' && grep '"name"' package.json | head -1 && echo '  Package.json vite:' && grep '"vite"' package.json && echo '  Installed vite:' && npm list vite --depth=0 && echo '  Vite binary:' && ls -la node_modules/.bin/vite && echo ''
buildCommand: echo 'ğŸš€ BUILD STARTING...' && echo '  Using explicit vite version...' && npx vite@5.4.11 build && echo '' && echo 'âœ… BUILD SUCCESS!' && echo 'ğŸ“Š Output files:' && ls -lh build/assets/ && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ“ CSS sizes:' && ls -lh build/assets/*.css
